title: Unified User Input Schema for Biochar Project Evaluation

feedstock.description: Information about the feedstock used in biochar production.

moisture_content.description: Percentage of water in the feedstock before processing.

production_process.description: Details about the production process used to create biochar.

production_temperature.description: Operating temperature of the production system in Celsius.

biochar_properties.description: Properties of the resulting biochar product.

organic_carbon_content.description: Percentage of organic carbon in the biochar on a dry weight basis.

ash_content.description: Percentage of ash content in the biochar.

biochar_application.description: Information about the application of the biochar product.

application_type.description: The type of application where the biochar is used.

lifecycle_emissions.description: Data related to emissions throughout the biochar production lifecycle.

baseline_emission_evidence.description: Optional evidence for non-zero baseline emissions.

pre_treatment.description: Emissions from feedstock pre-treatment in tonnes CO2e.
